mapper.select: select l.code,l.lost_date,l.kind,l.item,l.info,p.placeid,p.depplace,p.addr,p.tel,l.photo,p.x,p.y from p_lost l, p_place p where p.placeid=l.placeid and p.placeid=#{placeid}
select l.photo, l.state, l.code,l.lost_date,l.kind,l.item,l.info,p.depplace,p.addr,p.tel,p.x,p.y from s_lost l, s_place p where p.tel=l.tel and p.tel=#{tel}
select * from s_lost l, s_place p where p.tel=l.tel and code=#{code}
select count(*) from p_lost where kind like '%' || #{kind} || '%'
select count(*) from s_lost where kind like '%' || #{kind} || '%'

SELECT * FROM (select * from p_lost p join p_place l on p.placeid = l.placeid), (SELECT #{x} v_x, #{y} v_y, 110979.309 r_x, 88907.949 r_y, 1500.000 v_z FROM dual) WHERE SQRT( POWER((v_x - x) * r_x, 2) + POWER((v_y - y) * r_y, 2)) <= v_z and rownum < 50 AND x BETWEEN v_x - v_z / r_x AND v_x + v_z / r_x AND y BETWEEN v_y - v_z / r_y AND v_y + v_z / r_y order by lost_date desc
